BasicInfo.short: Fiverun is a cloud-based commerce platform that offers brands and retailers greater digital capabilities in-store.

Products.name: mobile Point of Commerce
Products.description: Leading native application with mobile POS, omnichannel, and customer engagement capabilities. Syncs with existing POS and ecomm systems.

Products.name: Commerce 360
Products.description: Commerce 360 unifies front-of-store and back-end operations, pulling together POS, inventory, OMS, warehouse in a single platform.

PastTeam.title: VP, Business Development and Customer Success
